Header: Six people die and 61 injured in a bus accident
Content: Six people have died and 61 have been admitted to hospitals following an accident involving two buses. The accident has occurred at Was-kaduwa area in North Kalutara. An SLTB Bus plying from Elpitiya to Colombo and a private bus from Mullaithivu to Tangalle have collided causing the accident. Police said the accident has taken place when the SLTB Bus was overtaking a Bowser at Kalutara. Three women have died in the accident. 57 of the injured have been admitted to Panadura hospital and Kalutara General Hospital and a child is among them. One of them has been transferred to Colombo National Hospital for further treatments.
